pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot with some slight camera movement. The video shows a private outdoor patio area in what appears to be a tropical resort. The patio features a round glass-topped table, chairs, and lounge beds, and it opens up to a sandy area with a large tree and lush green foliage.
